description: This week’s update is a battle of wills. In the beginning the very determined totaleuro defies Claire even while he is tied tight with a duct tape mask covering his head, completely depriving him of the ability to hear or see. Claire uses Her arsenal of ball busting, clamps, caning and Her keen skill for verbal humiliation until finally, he breaks and welcomes Her pain with his hands untied and his eyes willingly closed. Their chemistry is electric as the two battle it out and earn new respects for their roles as Mistress and slave.
title: Claire Adams and totaleurosex
